Krimmiel is a Romantic language, that is why, soon there will be a bit of Spanish, Italian and a eastern 'Earth' European languages.

Awesome idea! As a little help, i can suggest you to check out how this done for Na'vi language, for example: http://eanaeltu.learnnavi.org/dicts/DictionaryNavi.pdf

Plus i like it's language book's cover design:

But of course, book cover need to be different for Kerbal languages, i just showing an examples =)
